Critical to success is the ability to provide detailed support and develop relationships as a trusted advisor to the client supporting their high visibility programs focused on data analytics, business intelligence, software systems modernization, COTS implementation services, and related change management for the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) in Austin, TX (must work onsite).  The expertise should be in support of developing applications to support healthcare and financial applications. Expertise in Modeling and Simulation, Data Analytics, Business Intelligence, Healthcare and Financial Industries is a required qualification for Business Analysts. Must have experience with proposing new solutions to problems in the areas of their functional expertise. Must be able to work and analyze both independently and as part of a team.
